!Great Teacher Lawrence: Betimes the most obvious things escape our notice the longest. See here: a number is called out in each of the first four lines. One emperor, three pairs of wings, six catacombs, seven Necropolises... 1-6-6-7! That's the answer! Heh... how about that? Not bad for an old man!
